generated.css: :root{--bodyBg:rgba(0,0,0,0.2);--mainBackground:rgba(0,0,0,0.3);--secondBackground:rgba(0,0,0,0.1);--favList:#7d7d7d;--mainFont:"Roboto",sans-serif;--logoFont:"Montserrat",sans-serif;--buttonBg:rgba(0,0,0,0.2);--inputColor:#e8e8e8;--titleColor:#f7f7f7}@import url("https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Roboto&display=swap");@import url("https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Montserrat:wght@600&display=swap");*{box-sizing:border-box;letter-spacing:.04em}body{padding:0;margin:0;height:100vh;background:var(--bodyBg);font-family:var(--mainFont)}body::-webkit-scrollbar{width:4px}body::-webkit-scrollbar-track{background:#ddd}body::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb{background:#444;border-radius:4px}html{scroll-behavior:smooth}article,footer,header,main,nav{padding:.6em 1em}.dailyMenu,.reviews,nav div{padding:.3em .8em}.addReview,.review{padding:.1em .5em}.mainLeft,.mainRight{padding:2em}aside{box-sizing:border-box;background:var(--favList);position:fixed;z-index:1;height:100%;width:0;top:0;right:-4em;transition:.5s;font-size:1em;padding:1em 2em}.closeFav{position:absolute;top:0;right:.3em;font-size:2em;cursor:pointer}header{background:var(--mainBackground);height:15%;display:grid;grid-template-columns:1fr 15%;font-size:1.2em;font-family:var(--logoFont)}.favTrigger,.siteTitle{display:flex;align-items:center}.logo{height:2.2em;width:auto}.logoTitle{padding-left:.7em;font-weight:700;text-align:center}.favIcon{height:1.7em;width:auto;cursor:pointer}.favTrigger{justify-content:flex-end}main{background:var(--secondBackground);height:78%;display:grid;grid-template-rows:40% 60%}.mainLeft,.mainRight{position:relative}.formTitle{color:var(--titleColor);font-size:1.2em}main form input{margin-top:.5em}.imgDec{height:3.5em;width:auto;position:absolute;right:0;bottom:0}.mainRight{font-size:1.1em;color:var(--titleColor)}nav{background:var(--bodyBg);display:grid;grid-gap:.5em}nav div{width:100%;height:100%}.filterRestaurants,.paginationContainer{display:flex;justify-content:center;align-items:center}.resDiv span{display:block}.resImg{height:.9em;width:auto;position:absolute;right:1em;top:50%;transform:translateY(-50%)}.resDiv{box-shadow:-1px 2px 3px 3px rgba(0,0,0,.35);background:#a6a6a6;border-radius:8px;width:100%;display:grid;cursor:pointer;position:relative;color:var(--titleColor);max-width:650px;margin:0 auto}.dailyMenuTitle,.restaurantName,.resTitle{font-weight:700;font-size:1.1em}.resAdr,.restaurantAdress{font-size:.9em}.dishCnt{display:grid;grid-template-columns:1fr 20%}.cost{text-align:right}.dishCnt span{display:block}article{background:var(--secondBackground);display:grid;position:relative;color:var(--titleColor);grid-gap:.6em}.restaurantImg{height:5em;width:auto}.addFav{position:absolute;top:.4em;right:.3em}.restaurantAvgCost span,.restaurantAvgRating span{font-weight:700}.addReviewTitle{font-weight:700;font-size:.9em}footer{background:var(--mainBackground);height:7%;display:flex;justify-content:center;align-items:center}button,input[type=submit]{border:2px solid var(--buttonBg);border-radius:8px;padding:.2em .8em;font-size:1em;font-weight:700;cursor:pointer}button,input[type=submit],input[type=text]{font-family:var(--mainFont);background:var(--mainBackground);color:var(--inputColor);outline:none}input[type=text]{border:2px solid var(--buttonBg);border-radius:4px;font-size:.9em;padding:.2em .4em}#reviewCustomInput{font-size:.7em;margin-top:.3em}#reviewSubmit{font-size:.8em;margin-top:.3em}input::placeholder{color:rgba(0,0,0,.4)}input[type=range]{-webkit-appearance:none;margin:18px 0}input[type=range]:focus{outline:none}input[type=range]::-webkit-slider-runnable-track{height:.4em;cursor:pointer;box-shadow:1px 1px 1px #000,0 0 1px #0d0d0d;background:var(--favList);border-radius:1.3px;border:.2px solid #010101}input[type=range]::-webkit-slider-thumb{box-shadow:1px 1px 1px #000,0 0 1px #0d0d0d;border:1px solid #000;height:1.4em;width:1em;border-radius:3px;background:var(--titleColor);cursor:pointer;-webkit-appearance:none;margin-top:-.6em}input[type=range]:focus::-webkit-slider-runnable-track{background:var(--buttonBg)}@media only screen and (min-width:700px){:root{font-size:18px}}@media only screen and (min-width:1080px){main{grid-template-columns:40% 60%;grid-template-rows:100%}:root{font-size:20px}}
